Articles.Content:
Hey, currently im desperatly looking for some new scenarios, advanced tutorials or any kind of missions.

The only thing i found so far is this:

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/225951-kerbal-adventure

But its early alpha and not quite what i was looking for.

I found a youtube video about a scenario pack wich unfortunatly doesnt exist anymore.

So the thing im looking for is a pack of missions or scenarios or any kind of playable tutorial. Not modded in the Main game, but to find under the scenarios or tutorials tab.

Hope my english isnt to baad and somebody knows what im looking for or can join my quest for quests.
